ComicInfo.Title: Radiant[s]
ComicInfo.Summary:
NEW STORY ARC!
Picking up from the shocking ending of issue five, Radiant Black's life just got a whole lot more complicated. Pursued by a new enemy and not sure who to trust, will our hero escape with his life? Or is this the beginning of the end for RADIANT BLACK?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Daniele Di Nicuolo & Walter Baiamonte | 1-2 | B | Cover B | Felipe Watanabe & Marcelo Costa | 3 | C | 1:25 Retailer Incentive Cover C (Virgin) | Trevor McCarthy | 4 |
